component.name: Samplebrain
component.summary: A custom sample mashing app designed by Aphex Twin

description.p: Samplebrain chops samples up into a 'brain' of interconnected small sections called blocks which are connected into a network by similarity. It processes a target sample, chopping it up into blocks in the same way, and tries to match each block with one in it's brain to play in realtime.
This allows you to interpret a sound with a different one. As we worked on it (during 2015 and 2016) we gradually added more and more tweakable parameters until it became slightly out of control.

ul.li: Removed microphone input (temporarily, hopefully?) to help with security settings in windows and apple
